headline.main: Swedish Research Team Devolops First Blood Test to Detect Presence of Marijuana in Humans

docs.abstract: series on Swedish med system repts on development of blood test for detection of marijuana

byline.original: By LAWRENCE K. ALTMANSpecial to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: Swedish research team has developed the first blood test for marijuana. It detects the presence of THC, the potent chemical ingredient that scientists consider the key to a marijuana high.
docs.snippet: Swedish research team has developed the first blood test for marijuana. It detects the presence of THC, the potent chemical ingredient that scientists consider the key to a marijuana high.
